Package controller

Class PopUpFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.PopUpFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PopUpFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the javafx popupform html class.

      typeOfAlert - This is the alert entered onto the title label.
      description - This is the message entered onto the body of the screen.
      parentViewPath - This is the path to go back to the old screen.
